1450940.name: RPG Maker MZ - Haunted School Tiles
1450940.description:
Something terrifying is haunting the school classrooms and halls...

Haunted School Tiles will take your players on a terrifying journey into a school brimming with sorrow, anguish and danger. Created by Sherman3D, this pack includes the essentials you'll need to create the inside of a Victorian-inspired school or mansion that's possessed by evil. From altars and doll parts to blood-soaked floors, Haunted School Tiles is a great addition to your growing library of RPG Maker resources.

Features:
  • Basics needed to create a haunted school or mansion.
  • Student and teacher desks, blackboard, antique furniture suitable for horror games, thrillers and more.
  • Material arranged for both clean and cluttered maps.
  • For use in RPG Maker MZ.
1450940.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
